name: Frogzone
description:
Defeat evil Enemies with your powerful tongue strike in this short precision game!

in this game jam, we tried to see what would happen if you would connect the projective to the player, as a response to the "Joined together" Theme.

Programming - Sellpet, Dragi, Tazgirl

Art - Aviv, Kedios

Sound - Lando

Design - skando
